relation

new window, if True, it will be created inline

after creating the editor, set_value needs to be called to set the actual data to the editor

Parameters:
  • admin - the Admin interface for the objects on the one side of the
  • create_inline - if False, then a new entity will be created within a
  • vertical_header_clickable - True if the vertical header is clickable by the user, False if not.
